name: tm76
effect: Teaches Stealth Rock to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Struggle Bug to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV: Stealth Rock)

flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
The user lays a trap of levitating
stones around the foe. The trap hurts
foes that switch into battle.
flavor_text_entries.platinum:
The user lays a trap of levitating
stones around the foe. The trap hurts
foes that switch into battle.
flavor_text_entries.heartgold-soulsilver:
The user lays a trap of levitating
stones around the foe. The trap hurts
foes that switch into battle.
flavor_text_entries.black-white:
Resisting, the user attacks the
opposing Pokémon. The targets’ Sp. Atk
stat is reduced.
flavor_text_entries.black-2-white-2:
Resisting, the user attacks the
opposing Pokémon. The targets’ Sp. Atk
stat is reduced.
flavor_text_entries.x-y:
While resisting, the user attacks the
opposing Pokémon. This lowers the
Sp. Atk stat of those hit.
flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
The user soars and then strikes its target on the
next turn.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
The user soars and then strikes its target on the
next turn.
flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
The user flies up into the sky and then
strikes its target on the next turn.
flavor_text_entries.sword-shield:
The user attacks the target with a song. Others can
join in the Round to increase the power of
the attack.
